def test_zero_crossing_no_crossing():
    y = [1, 2, 3]
    expected = []
    indices = zero_crossing_indices(y)
    np.testing.assert_array_equal(indices, expected)

def test_zero_crossing_multiple_noise():
    y = [0.01, -0.01, 0.02, -0.02, 0.03, -0.03, 0.04]
    expected = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]
    indices = zero_crossing_indices(y)
    np.testing.assert_array_equal(indices, expected)

def test_zero_crossing_at_eps():
    y = [0.0, 0.0, 1.0, -1.0]
    expected = [3]
    indices = zero_crossing_indices(y)
    np.testing.assert_array_equal(indices, expected)
